long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Xevious is an iconic and immersive game available as a Chrome extension. Take control of a powerful fighter aircraft and embark on a daring mission to save the world from an alien invasion. Navigate through treacherous landscapes, blasting enemy aircraft and ground targets with your advanced weaponry. The game features smooth controls, vibrant visuals, and an intense soundtrack that enhances the immersive experience. 
As you progress, the enemies become more formidable, challenging your reflexes and strategic thinking. Collect power-ups and unleash devastating special attacks to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Xevious on Chrome Extension offers a nostalgic trip back to the golden era of arcade gaming, with its addictive gameplay and captivating action. Strap in, engage the enemy, and prove your skills as an ace pilot in this thrilling and timeless shooter game.
